Bug 217922  [KeyBindings] CTRL+Z EOF no longer works in console1.  launch this testcase in debug mode
2.  from the console, type in something and enter CTRL+Z

Expected:
The testcase should run to completion

Actual:
The testcase never gets to read CTRL+Z... and never runs to completion.

Testcase:
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		try {
			int count=0;
			while (System.in.read() != -1)
			    count++;
			System.out.println("Input has " + count + " chars.");
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
